get.summary: Find the status of an Order.
get.description: This service looks up an Order status.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of an Order for which status should be fetched.

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: ID of Seller for the Order for which status should be fetched.

parameters.name: buyerId
parameters.description: ID of Buyer for the Order for which status should be fetched. Unse in conjunction with buyerPurchaseOrderNumber, as the buyerPurchaseOrderNumber is unique within a Buyer

parameters.name: buyerPurchaseOrderNumber
parameters.description: ID of buyerPurchaseOrderNumber for the Order for which status should be fetched. Unse in conjunction with buyerId, as the buyerId is unique within a Buyer

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View of the resource that you want to get.
